typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'delimited',
	fileSystem: 'southridge',
	folderPath: 'CloudSales',
	fileName: 'dbo.Customers.txt',
	columnDelimiter: ',',
	escapeChar: '\\',
	quoteChar: '\"',
	columnNamesAsHeader: true) ~> CloudSalesCustomers
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'delimited',
	fileSystem: 'southridge',
	folderPath: 'CloudStreaming',
	fileName: 'dbo.Customers.txt',
	columnDelimiter: ',',
	escapeChar: '\\',
	quoteChar: '\"',
	columnNamesAsHeader: false) ~> CloudStreamingCustomers
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
CloudSalesCustomers join(ERROR_FUNCTION('') == ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
